I wish when they do these character profile things that they wouldn’t bother with her measurements and instead give us stuff like age, details about her libido, body count, sex habits, that sort of thing.

@GoogleMeBitch I figured someone would point that out. But the bigger chunk of the story is not about FMC actively cheating in a sense. She wasn't in need for another man, she just wants to get in a uni. If say, the story starts with the ending as the main plot, like a story where FMC goes to meet sexfriend grandson behind her bf's back, then yeah I'd say it's just cheating and it needs no ntr tag as long as the bf's pov is again disregarded. But for this one, plot revolves around how FMC who has a boyfriend ends up becoming someone who actively cheats behind his back cuz his sex was good. The initially unwanted sex of another man changed her into a cheater, that's pretty much ntr to me. At least, that's how I define it since it also fits how it is in japanese. https://youtube.com/channel/UCtgWhU5LN1e3fZqIhcqp_aA

Im not sure how this doesn't look like ntr to some, but just to confirm: It is ntr. Story is about FMC being on a slump cuz her boobs are getting bigger. She has a boyfriend but he's not that important to the story lol. One day, a board chairman from a uni she's aiming for (scholarship maybe?) came to meet her. Having noticed that FMC is in a slump rn, she used this opportunity to ask a favor from her in exchange for helping her secure her uni dream. Apparently, chairman has a grandson who's enrolled in the same school as FMC but he has stopped going to school for some time now. Basically, she wants FMC to help him get back to school by inspiring him. From here, I guess the illustration is enough info to know what happened. In the end, grandson managed to go back to schooling (yay), people in school pisses him off tho. As for FMC, she got into the uni she wanted and still got her bf with her. But now, she became good "friends" with grandson... maybe a little too good.

@WyrdX From a short glance I see, She was always good at track and fields but suddenly over the past year her boobs grew big and affected her run time. As a result she could no longer get a scholarship through track and fields to go to the same school the guys she like wants to go. The old lady in the story is the director of said university the guy wanted to go and she is offering the girl another proposal, that fat guy seems to be her grandson.

I might be wrong, since I just briefly browsed through.

Why is this netorare though? It's not like she was in a rel with any guy (unless that dude in the beginning) so she is not "being stolen". It's just your typical story of a normal JK girl falling deeper into lust addiction with a big dick UB. Anyway, the art is nice.
